name: search-ehou-chrome-extension
description: Chrome Extension for collecting and auto-filling questions from online quizzes

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run minify && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:dev: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run copy-assets
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html
scripts.minify:js: terser background.js -o dist/background.js --compress --mangle && terser popup.js -o dist/popup.js --compress --mangle && terser content.js -o dist/content.js --compress --mangle && terser api-client.js -o dist/api-client.js --compress --mangle && terser bulk-collector.js -o dist/bulk-collector.js --compress --mangle && terser security-config.js -o dist/security-config.js --compress --mangle
scripts.minify:css: cleancss popup.css -o dist/popup.css && cleancss content.css -o dist/content.css
scripts.minify:html: html-minifier-terser popup.html -o dist/popup.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true && html-minifier-terser options.html -o dist/options.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true
scripts.copy-assets: cp -r icons dist/ && copyfiles manifest.json dist/
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch . --ext js,css,html --ignore dist/ --ignore node_modules/ --ignore .yarn/ --exec 'npm run build:dev'
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../search-ehou-extension.zip .

author: Search EHOU Team
